xml.data:
Home » 39P3 Dhammānuloma (1), Dukatikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (3) » 2 Hetugocchaka, Kusalattika » 2.3 Hetusampayuttaduka, Kusalattika » 2.3.2 Akusalapada » 2.3.2.7 Pañhāvāra
Paccanīyuddhāra
Hetugocchaka, Kusalattika
Hetusampayuttaduka, Kusalattika
Akusalapada
Pañhāvāra
Paccanīyuddhāra
37.
1338Hetusampayutto akusalo dhammo hetusampayuttassa akusalassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo…  sahajātapaccayena paccayo…  upanissayapaccayena paccayo. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
38.
1339Nahetuyā nava, naārammaṇe nava. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
1340Hetupaccayā naārammaṇe dve. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
1341Nahetupaccayā ārammaṇe nava. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
1342(Yathā kusalattike pañhāvārassa anulomampi paccanīyampi anulomapaccanīyampi paccanīyānulomampi gaṇitaṃ, evaṃ gaṇetabbaṃ.)
<< Hetu-ārammaṇaup2.3.3 Abyākatapada >>
